name: TicTasks, Inc.
description: Provider of an employment application software designed to help small businesses to hire. The company's employment application software offers to post jobs to craigslist and then search, sort and contact, enabling businesses to search candidates directly from a smartphone or tablet.
one_liner: Provider of an employment application software designed to help small businesses to hire. The company's employment application software offers to post jobs to craigslist and then search, sort and contact, enabling businesses to search candidates directly from a smartphone or tablet.
